flawed_nl_solution:
Tom is 32+5=<<32+5=73>>73 years old
So 7 years ago he was 73-7=<<73-7=66>>66 years old
Half of his age was 66/2=<<66/2=33>>33 years old
So 7 years ago Jim was 33+5=38
So he is now 38+7=<<38+7=45>>45 years old
That means in 2 years he will be 45+2=<<45+2=47>>47 years old
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 37, not 73. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
